Creator: Flagg, James Montgomery, 1877-1960, artist
Description: Poster shows an angry man taking off his coat in reaction to a newspaper headline "Huns kill women and children!"; the newspaper and the man's hat are on the ground at his feet.
Physical Collection: Texas War Records War Poster collection
